resources.string:
"In order to ensure the quality of our professionals,
" "they must pass a short vetting process.
" "This may take up to 3 business days.

" "Once approved, your account will be made live
" "and you can begin taking requests."
"If you are a part of, or own a company,\n" "you can fill it down below."
"Otherwise, you can skip this step,\n" "and continue registration as a freelancer."
"A verification link has been sent to your email."
"When you're ready to start accepting requests,\n" "remember to set your status as 'Available'!"
